C M Cherry Consulting.title: Full-Stack Developer
description: Handled the authentication flow with Amazon Cognito for seamless integration with AWS services and cost-effectiveness.
Built a user-friendly, dynamic form for data input required in biological analysis.
Developed a robust, feature-rich table component with full CRUD functionality.

Utilized libraries and tools such as Redux, Mantine, TanStack Table, React Flow, and Vitest.
